name: Trapped (itch) (CradAl)
description:
Trapped is a walking simulator/ survival prototype built during the 2019 marketplace takeover GameJam. 

===========================================================

You are a travelling entity that has become trapped in a land nearly devoid of life. Slowly you find yourself losing strength in this realm and are desperate for a way to leave. Then the whispers begin, telling you to collect the coins filled with life energy in order to summon a portal to escape.  You need to juggle between finding the Life coins and consuming life around the map to escape successfully

===========================================================

CONTROLS 

M&KB only

WASD = Movement

Space = Jump

E = Interact

ESC = quit game

===========================================================

Supported platforms 

Windows
